title: Tamil Handwriting Character Recognition Pedagogical Design Using Transfer Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic deep learning concepts, understanding of CNN models, Python programming experience, and language instruction experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: Development of digital pedagogy for enhanced Tamil language education, emphasizing practical training based on real classroom scenarios in VR environments.

learning_goals: The accuracy of Tamil handwritten character recognition can be improved to over 90% using a transfer learning model based on Inception-v3.
The HP Tamil dataset can be preprocessed, and the feature extraction process can be replicated in a simulated environment.
Instructional design strategies can be developed to adjust model hyperparameters based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
